ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" Sony CCD imager, 420 TV lines
Lens: 3.6mm wide angle. Signal system: NTSC
Built in light sensor, 20 Infrared illuminators for night vision. Built in microphone for audio
Weatherproof housing for outdoor and indoor application.Cable through bracket protects the camera from vandalism
Package include: 4 of Sony CCD cameras, 4 of 12V DC power supplies and 4 of security warning decals
